titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the castle-chamber at Dublin, the XXII. of November, anno 1622 At the censuring of certaine officers, who refused to take the Oath of Supremacie. By Iames Bishop of Meath.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the castle-chamber at Dublin, the XXII. of November, anno 1622 At the censuring of certaine officers, who refused to take the Oath of Supremacie. By Iames Bishop of Meath.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for the Partners of the Irish Stocke,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A speech in the castle-chamber concerning the Oath of Supremacie.
The last leaf contains a commendation from King James to the author.
Usually found as part 5 of STC 24544 or 24544.5.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

person.persName: the Partners of the Irish Stocke
